name: Bunny Blocker
description:
The bunnies are hungry and they won't stop just because a giant rock is in their way. They won't even stop if a wolf is about to make them lunch!

This is where you come in. Manipulate the environment so the bunny can make it successfully to the basket of carrots. Not as easy as it sounds. Slide fences, move boulders, open doors, and block those wolves!

80 innovative and challenging levels!
